body: Okay, I've updated the plan9-386 GOROOT_BOOTSTRAP tarball to Go tip (at 59fc42b230), trimmed down for size (see https://github.com/golang/go/issues/9797#issuecomment-204592820), and rebuilt the plan9-386 buildlet at the same revision and deployed, restarted farmer.golang.org, and reset the failed plan9 builds on the dashboard, so they're trying again now.
